thread.title: Watch: New Trailer for Guy Ritchie's 'King Arthur' | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Watch: New Trailer for Guy Ritchie's 'King Arthur' | The Daily Dot

author: Gavia Baker-Whitelaw
title: Watch: New Trailer for Guy Ritchie's 'King Arthur' | The Daily Dot
text:
Photo via King Arthur: Legend of the Sword BTW 
It takes a particular kind of filmmaker to simultaneously aim for gritty realism and elaborate fantasy nonsense at the same time. That filmmaker is Guy Ritchie, and his latest project is King Arthur: Legend of the Sword . 
We got our first look at King Arthur during Comic Con 2016, with a trailer that ticked every box for a Guy Ritchie movie. If you ever wanted to see Arthurian legends reimagined as a London gangster movie with homoerotic boxing scenes, this was your jam. 
Now, the second trailer elaborates on the film's fantasy side, focusing on Excalibur and giving us a better look at Jude Law 's appropriately ridiculous villain role. This educational historical drama is due out on May 12, six weeks before 2017's other extremely factual King Arthur movie, Transformers: The Last Knight . Up next after the break: Recommendations
